CSI API ETABS v1

Introduction

This document illustrates how to start/connect to ETABS using the CSI Application Programming Interface (API) from a variety of clients.

With the release of ETABS v22.0.0, the API is defined in the form of a .NET Standard 2.0 dynamic link library (DLL) for improved compatibility with a large variety of client applications. Please refer to the Release Notes page.

Please note that ETABS must be installed both on the API client development machine, and on the client end-user's machine.
